pageProps.title: How to Use React with Node.js Express.js
pageProps.metaDesc: React is a popular front-end JavaScript library that is used for building user interfaces. Node.js is a popular back-end JavaScript runtime that is used for building server-side applications. Express.js is a popular web framework for Node.js. In this article, we will learn how to use React with Node.js and Express.js to build a full-stack web application.
